metadata.synopsis: PAD that triggers when players use the hidden switch in the back room of the Baldurs Mouth Gazette.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Succeed on a passive perception check and then use the statue head in the back of the Baldurs Mouth building at CTY_Main_A Coords (65, 38, -45)

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Huh. Seemed to make something click into place up above.
